SANDWICHES & BEVERAGES

Tandoori style

(Tandoori sauce + mayo + garlic + chilly + lime juice + onion + tomato + capsicum + grilled multi grain bread + cheese)

Peri-Peri style

(Paprika + mayo + hot sauce + onion + tomato + capsicum + grilled multi grain bread + cheese)

Chipotle style

(Chipotle sauce + mayo + garlic + chilly + onion + tomato + capsicum + grilled multi grain bread + cheese)

BBQ style

(Barbecue sauce + charcoal smoke + mayo + onion + tomato + capsicum + grilled multi grain bread + cheese)

Achari style

(Pickle + Spices + coriander + mint + garlic + lime juice + onion + tomato + capsicum + grilled multi grain bread + cheese)

Bombae style Sandwich

(Potato + onion + capsicum + tomato + cucumber + butter + green chutney + grilled multi grain bread)

Nutella Sandwich

(Cacao powder + peanut + bread)

Egg Sandwich

(Egg + butter + salt + mayo + sweet onion sauce + chilly + cheese + grilled multi grain bread)

Cheesey Corn Sandwich

(Corn + Cheese + mayo + herbs + spices)

Tuna Sandwich

(Tuna + mayo + cheese + onion + capsicum)

Espresso

(Chicoo + Cacao Powder + Cashew + banana + Dates + Milk of Choice)

Experience the ultimate intensity of espresso: a bold, rich shot of coffee perfection.

Flat white

(Mango, Banana, Blue Spirulina, Milk)

Indulge in the smooth harmony of espresso and velvety microfoam with our signature flat white coffee.

Filter coffee

(Mango + Pineapple + Banana + Milk)

Savor the pure, smooth flavor of freshly brewed filter coffee, crafted for your perfect morning.

Americano black coffee

(Mango + Pineapple + Banana + Milk)

Discover the robust simplicity of our Americano black coffee: pure, strong, and satisfyingly smooth.

Ice Americano coffee

Cool down with our refreshing Ice Americano: bold espresso over ice for a crisp and invigorating pick-me-up.

Ice mocha coffee

Delight in our Ice Mocha: a creamy, chocolatey espresso treat served chilled for the perfect blend of rich and refreshing.

Ice blue macha coffee

Experience the refreshing fusion of matcha and espresso over ice with our Ice Blue Matcha Coffee, a unique blend of energizing flavors

Affagato coffee

Indulge in our Ice Affogato Coffee: velvety espresso poured over creamy gelato, creating a luxurious and refreshing treat

Classic cold coffee

Enjoy the classic coolness of our Cold Coffee: smooth, creamy, and perfect for any time of day.

Vanilla cold coffee

Savor the smooth sophistication of our Vanilla Cold Coffee, blending rich espresso with creamy vanilla for a refreshing delight.

Hazelnut cold coffee

Indulge in the rich flavor of our Hazelnut Cold Coffee, a creamy blend of espresso and hazelnut essence for a delightful refreshment.

butterscotch cold coffee

Experience the decadent fusion of espresso and butterscotch in our refreshing Butterscotch Cold Coffee, a creamy indulgence perfect for any coffee lover.

Butterfly Pea Flower Blue Tea

(kiwi + pineapple + Green Grapes)

Experience the enchanting color-changing magic and delicate floral taste of Butterfly Pea Flower Blue Tea – a mesmerizing, caffeine-free wonder in every cup.

Heavenly hibiscus red tea

(Pineapple + Orange + Ice + Mint )

Indulge in the vibrant, tangy delight of Heavenly Hibiscus Red Tea – a refreshing, caffeine-free escape in every sip.

LOVELY LAVENDER TEA PARTY

( Cucumber, Orange, Lime, Ice)

Delight in the calming, aromatic elegance of Lovely Lavender Tea Party – the perfect soothing blend for a serene escape.

ZESTY LEMON GINGER GREEN TEA

(Green grapes, Black Grapes, Ice )

Revitalize your senses with Zesty Lemon Ginger Green Tea – a zesty, invigorating blend that brings a burst of energy to your day.

TRADITIONAL CHINESE OOLONG TEA

( Strawberry+ Pomegranate + Ice)

Savor the rich, complex flavors of Traditional Chinese Oolong Tea – a timeless, aromatic journey in every cup.

PURPLE GINGER LEMON TEA

(Pineapple, Pomegrante, ginger, Ice in two separate layers)

Awaken your taste buds with Purple Ginger Lemon Tea – a vibrant, tangy fusion of ginger and lemon for a refreshing boost
